title: Share of global net sales of Luxottica by geographical area 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of net sales for 5 number of Geographical areas.
The Share of net sales is appeared to be the highest at Geographical area North America and lowest at Geographical area Rest of the world.
The highest Geographical area North America has 56.0 more Share of net sales than the lowest Geographical area Rest of the world.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Geographical area, and Share of net sales in each Geographical area on the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of net sales for 5 number of Geographical areas.
The Share of net sales is appeared to be the highest at Geographical area North America and lowest at Geographical area Rest of the world.
The highest Geographical area North America has 56.0 more Share of net sales than the lowest Geographical area Rest of the world.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
The maximum Share of net sales 58.0 is found at Geographical area North America and the minimum is found at Rest of the world where Geographical area is 2.0.
Geographical area Europe has the second highest value for Share of net sales.
The highest value at Geographical area North America is 29.0x times more than the lowest value at Rest of the world.
Share of net sales at Geographical area North America is 58.0 , second place is Europe at 21.0, and thirdly is Asia-Pacific at 13.0.
The Geographical area Rest of the world tends to be 2.9 percent lower than average.
The Share of net sales is 100.0 if we add up values of all Geographical areas.
